issue.title: [CF 301] Instant cast spells
issue.body:
Can the spell cast icon type be expanded to show for a specified amount of time when a target casts an instant spell?
The reason I really want this feature is for molten seeds on heroic Ragnaros. If I could have a tmw icon do an announce in /say or /yell when Rag casts molten seeds it would really help my raid group move in unison.
There's information on how exactly the molten seed casts is shown in the combat log here
http://www.mmo-champion.com/threads/988235-Weak-Auras-and-Molten-Seed-question


> Posted by CurseForge user Halsey1006 | Imported from CurseForge issue #301 | Raw

comments.body:
Would best be done in a new icon type.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

This can now be done with the Combat Log Event icon type. A little late for Ragnaros, but I'm sure that you will find another need for this in the future.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
